head.title: THE MEDIA BUSINESS: Advertising; Young & Rubicam

hedline.hl1: THE MEDIA BUSINESS: Advertising; Young & Rubicam

block.p: LEAD: Young & Rubicam appointed two more creative directors at its New York headquarters. They are Joey Cummings, formerly executive creative director at Bozell Chicago, and Michael Hampton, who was promoted from executive vice president and group creative director. Y.& R. also said Friday that it had acquired Arbeit & Company of New York, a data base marketing consulting firm.

LEAD: Young & Rubicam appointed two more creative directors at its New York headquarters. Y.& R. also said Friday that it had acquired Arbeit & Company of New York, a data base marketing consulting firm.
